description: The function 'create_multi_picture_graph' generates a 2x2 grid of picture graphs in a single image. Each graph represents categorical data with star symbols, where the number of stars corresponds to the frequency of each category. This function is useful for educational purposes, helping students visualize and understand the distribution of categorical data.

stimulus_type_specification.title: Available Images: Multi Picture Graphs
stimulus_type_specification.description: The 'create_multi_picture_graph' function can draw a 2x2 grid of picture graphs, each representing categorical data. It accepts a MultiGraphList as input, which should contain exactly four CategoricalGraph objects. Each CategoricalGraph object includes the data (category and frequency), title, and picture configuration (star value, star unit, and show half star value). The function validates the input data, ensuring that there are exactly four sets of data. The function is designed for educational purposes, allowing students to visualize and compare the distribution of different categorical datasets.

details: MultiGraphList: A list containing exactly four CategoricalGraph objects
CategoricalGraph: An object that includes the data (category and frequency), title, and picture configuration
Data: A list of objects, each containing a category and its frequency
Title: The title of the graph
Picture Configuration: An object containing the star value, star unit, and show half star value
The MultiGraphList must contain exactly four CategoricalGraph objects
Each CategoricalGraph object must include the data (category and frequency), title, and picture configuration
The data should be a list of objects, each containing a category and its frequency
The frequencies in the data should be integers
The function draws a 2x2 grid of picture graphs in a single image
Each graph represents categorical data with star symbols, where the number of stars corresponds to the frequency of each category
The title of each graph is displayed at the top

educational_standards.description: Draw a scaled picture graph to represent a data set with several categories.
